K12D0465_H0445:552b-1: badzra su kha kro dha tantra r'a dza /
K12D0465_H0445:552b-3: rdo rje bde khros rgyud kyi rgyal po /
K12D0465_H0445:552b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0465_H0445:552b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na //
K12D0465_H0445:552b-6: bcom ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal ba zhes
K12D0465_H0445:552b-7: bya ba 'og min gyi gnas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
K12D0465_H0445:552b-8: kyi pho brang na bzhugs so //
K12D0465_H0445:552b-9: de'i tshe 'dus pa rnams kyis dang po sems dpa' chen po yid cher g-yos te //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-5: ae ma'o byams mgon thugs rje can //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-6: 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad kun //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-7: me yis tshig cing mtshon gyis phog /
K12D0465_H0445:553a-8: mun par 'khyams nas ri yis non //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-9: rlung gis khyer ba snying re rje //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-10: skyabs kyi dam pa bka' stsal 'tshal //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-12: der ni mgon pos sku bstan te //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-13: zhal gyi padma rab phye nas //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-14: spyan gyi gzi ma dangs kun la gzigs //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-15: ljags kyi dkyil nas bka' stsal pa //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-16: skyob pa'i dam pa 'di yin gyis //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-17: rdo rje bde dang khros pa yi //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-18: dum bu gsum pa ngas bshad kyis //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-19: legs par nyon la yid la zungs //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-21: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gtam rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:553a-22: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-23: bkra shis mandal legs byas la //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-24: tshul dang mthun pa'i bum pa dgod //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-25: de yang chu gtsang sna bdun blugs //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-26: gzhan yang shing tog 'bras bu dang //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-32: bum pa de'i mgrin pa dar sngon pos dkris te /
K12D0465_H0445:553a-33: steng du bla re phub la gzhag go /
K12D0465_H0445:553a-34: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las sgrub rdzas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:553a-35: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-36: sgrub byed rang rgyud dag pa yis //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-37: bskyed tshul rgyas sam bsdus kyang rung //
K12D0465_H0445:553a-38: h'um las phyag na rdo rje ni //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-0: dbu gsum mthing @553b nag phyag bzhi mdzas /
K12D0465_H0445:553b-1: sku ni che zhing mtshungs pa med //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-2: zhabs kyis rgya mtsho'i nang du yang //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-3: chu srin sbal pa'i steng du brdzis //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-4: g-yas g-yon dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-5: rdo rje gsor zhing dril chen rdung //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-6: mtha' gnyis drug pa zhal du 'dren //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-7: dbu gsum g-yas dkar rigs lngas ba rgyan //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-8: dbu g-yon dmar po sbrul gyis mdzes //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-9: zhal dbus mthing nag lcags mchu can //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-10: steng du mkha' lding tshangs pa sprul //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-11: dpa' bo gdug pa dpung pa'i rgyan //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-12: rin chen lhun po'i ri rab la //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-13: stegs bcas zhum pa med par bzhugs //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-14: de ltar lha dang rab sbyar nas //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-15: de nyid bstan pa'i yan lag gis //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-16: rang lus tshags su gzhug par gyis //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-17: rdo rje bde khros pa'i rgyud las lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:553b-18: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-19: sgo gsum sbyor ba shes pa yis //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-20: gsang ba'i snying po 'bum du bzlas //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-21: aom badzra tsanda sarba dushtam ta ka ha na /
K12D0465_H0445:553b-22: da ha pa tsa h'um phat/
K12D0465_H0445:553b-23: bco brgyad sngags kyi rgyal po 'di //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-26: rtag tu mtshan ma bzang po 'byung //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-28: rang la nges par ston par 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-29: bsnyen pa'i rim pas thub mi thub //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-30: 'bad pas legs par brtag par bya //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-31: de nas gtor ma'i sbyin pa ni //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-32: aom a'a: h'um zhes rgyun du gtang ngo //
K12D0465_H0445:553b-33: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gsang ba'i snying
K12D0465_H0445:553b-34: po dang mtshan ltas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o
K12D0465_H0445:553b-35: //// de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-3: 'jig rten ma lus sbyangs nas kyang //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-4: slar la thig le nyid la 'dus //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-5: sgra dang bcas te rang gsal 'bar //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-6: brtan par gyur na spro bsdu bya //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-7: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las me'i bsam gtan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:554a-8: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-9: mthing gi shog gu sngon po la //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-10: gser gyi 'khor lo bris pa'i steng //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-11: bsrung ba'i snying po legs bkod de //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-12: gang ming raksha sbyar bar gyis //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-13: de yang tri yi sa yongs bgos te //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-14: sangs rgyas sems can nyid la bstim //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-15: de nyid bum par legs bzhugs la //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-16: mchod cing bzlas brjod gsol ba gdab //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-17: de nas tshes pa'i dus bzang la //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-18: rang ngam gzhan la btags gyur na //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-19: bar chad thams cad nyer zhi nas //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-20: tshe dpal bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-21: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:554a-22: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-23: 'gro ba dug gis gdungs pa la //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-24: gdug pa'i dbang chen la sogs pa //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-27: nyam chung 'thibs dang ltas kyang ngan //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-28: yang yang na zhing gtam bsnol 'ong //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-29: de ni klu yi gnod pa ste //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-30: tshor nas legs bar bcos na bzlog /
K12D0465_H0445:554a-31: sa srin mi la 'di ltar gnod //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-33: sha bkra zor bu ngo yang 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:554a-34: de yang tshor nas bcos nas bzlog /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-1: gdon yang shin tu ldog 'gyur te //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-2: na tsha'i zug rdu drag por 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-3: res 'ga' bde ba ltar yang byed //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-4: skabs su thig le kho nar na //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-5: de yang bcos dka' shes pas bzlog /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-6: gnyen gyi gnod pa 'di yin te //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-7: shin tu na tsha'i tshabs kyang che //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-8: rkang lag na 'khums dri ma ldog /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-9: sha khrag lud nas mig kyang sle //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-10: kha yo sna yo chu ser za //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-11: kha yang mi thub gnod pa za //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-12: chu bur byung na tshang yang che //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-13: tshor bar mi chog bsgrim pa gces //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-14: gdon tshogs gzhan yang yun mi rtog /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-15: phra mo tsam la sogs pa bzlog /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-16: kun la bsgrims te bcos na 'tsho //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-17: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gzhan gyi gnod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:554b-18: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-19: dbang chen la sogs thams cad la //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-20: mchod dang gtor mas mgu bar bya //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-21: ci 'dod pa yi rdzas rnams sbyin //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-22: rten yod gnas su legs par spa //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-23: snyan pa'i tshig gis bsgo byas la //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-24: bum pa nor bu rin chen gzhug /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-25: mjes pa'i dar sna 'bru yi mdzod //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-26: gang gi rten la sbas gyur na //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-27: gnod pa rags pa zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-28: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las zhi byed mchod thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:554b-29: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-30: btsan dug gu gul gla rtsi dang //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-31: shu dag shing kun mu zi drug /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-32: gsang sngags btab ste lus la byug /
K12D0465_H0445:554b-33: gu gul nya mkhris gla rtsi dang //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-34: sgog pa shu dag dri chen rnams //
K12D0465_H0445:554b-35: bdug pa byas te yang na bkru /
K12D0465_H0445:555a-0: @555a *// gser g-yu byi ru mig ma phug /
K12D0465_H0445:555a-1: btsan dug rma bya'i mkhris par bcas //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-2: bcangs na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-3: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rten 'brel rdzas kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:555a-4: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu dang po bstan pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:555a-5: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-6: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-7: drag sngags 'di dag brjod par bya'o //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-8: aom a'a ra na sod sod /
K12D0465_H0445:555a-14: m'a ra na myos bying thum ril dza: mi tshig spangs te drag sngags 'di //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-15: dbugs ma shor bar sbub mas drangs //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-16: bum par bstims nas rtags thob nas //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-18: sngags la gang ming sbyar byas nas //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-19: yungs kar gdug pa'i phur pa la //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-20: brjod de las la sbyar gyur na //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-21: gang la bzlas pa brlag par 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-22: ma bsgrubs lan cig brjod pas kyang //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-23: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-25: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las drag sngags khros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:555a-26: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-27: rdzas bsag lha bskyed drag sngags bzlas //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-28: dgod pa tshang ba'i bum pa ste //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-29: mi dmigs bam las rin po che'i //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-30: bum pa tshul dang mthun par bsam //
K12D0465_H0445:555a-31: de nas bam dang lam las ni //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-0: chu dang sa yi dkyil @555b 'khor bsam //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-1: lha bsgoms khyad par bum pa 'dzin //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-2: mchu ni rdo rje'i sbu gu ste //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-5: 'od zer lcags kyi sbub mar drangs //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-6: bum par khro chu khol mar 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-7: de 'thungs bkrus pas gang gnod pa //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-8: rdul du brlag ste dag par bsam //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-9: brtsams pa'i las la the che ma med //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-10: rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las bum pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:555b-11: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-12: rdzas bsag lha bsgom 'khor lo bskor //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-13: ro ras byi dug bya rog sgros //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-14: khru gang tsam gyis mtshan nyid la //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-16: 'ug pa'i sgro rtsa g-yas pa yis //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-17: drag sngags mnyam pa'i re'u mig bri //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-18: de nas mtshan mar gang dmigs gzugs //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-19: kha dog rigs bzhi nyid du bya //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-20: de snying drag sngags re re dgod //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-21: mandal gtsang ma dris byug ste //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-22: dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-23: rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan byas te //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-25: 'khor lo bskor ba'i rim pa ni //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-26: drag sngags mnyam pa'i 'khor lo bskor //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-28: n'a ga tsakra m'a ra n'a h'um phat/
K12D0465_H0445:555b-29: gang bsam 'di la the tshom med //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-30: rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:555b-31: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-32: rdzas bsag lha bsgom phur pa gdab //
K12D0465_H0445:555b-33: lcags sam seng ldeng dug shing la //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-0: @556a *// sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-1: 'khor lo'i mtha' ma bskor te dgod //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-2: lha bsgom khyad par phur bu 'dzin //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-3: drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-4: n'a ga badzra k'i l'a ya m'a ra na h'um phat/
K12D0465_H0445:556a-5: sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-6: brtsam pa'i las la the tshom med //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-7: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las phur pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-8: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-9: rdzas bsag lha bsgom sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-10: gdug pa'i shing bu khru gang tshad //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-11: sngags kyi grangs kyang mnyam par bya //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-12: sngon dmar skud pas rim gsum dkri //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-13: bar der 'khor lo'i srog rtsa gcad //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-14: lag tu gri thogs drag sngags brjod //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-15: n'a ga tikshna che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat//
K12D0465_H0445:556a-16: rin par bgrangs te g-yas gzhi'i khud //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-17: byang shar mtshams su rnam par gzhag /
K12D0465_H0445:556a-18: de nas mandal dbus nyid du //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-19: hom khung brus te dug khrag byug /
K12D0465_H0445:556a-20: nang du ho ma du gzugs par bya //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-21: 'khor lo gris gtubs thogs nas ni; ;grangs dang mnyam par bsreg par bya //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-22: mi de yugs sa'i khyim nas bslang //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-23: lha bsgom khyad par me dpung 'dzin //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-24: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa 'di //
K12D0465_H0445:556a-25: n'a ga tsitna dzva la ram/
K12D0465_H0445:556a-28: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las me dpung khros pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:556b-0: @556b de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-1: rdzas bsag lha bsgom mnan bsngags bzlas //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-2: chu srin sram mam byi ba'i mgor //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-3: bsregs ba'i thal ba bsdus byas la //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-4: gang yin nyid kyi sbyor ba bcas /
K12D0465_H0445:556b-5: lha bsgom khyad par ri rab 'dzin //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-6: drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-8: mnan byas chu srin kha ru bsgom //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-9: 'di byas gang la bzlas pa brlag /
K12D0465_H0445:556b-10: 'di la the tshom mi bya'o; ;rdo rje bde khros
K12D0465_H0445:556b-11: kyi rgyud las ri rab khros pa'i le'u ste bco
K12D0465_H0445:556b-12: lnga pa'o //// rdo rje bde khres kyi rgyud las dum bu gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:556b-13: de nas mngon par bshad bya ba //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-14: glang po'i pags par 'brug bris nas //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-15: gang ming bcug ste drag sngags bzlas //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-18: klu yi gzugs rnams bris pa la //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-19: bstim nas drag sngags rgya ba gyur na //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-20: gnam chu dus su phebs par 'gyur //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-21: thod par ae bris sngags kyis bskor //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-22: gang yin bcug la bstims pa la //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-23: drag sngags gang yin bzlas byas na //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-24: myur du 'grub par gdon mi za //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-25: srog chags 'jigs par gyur pa la //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-26: 'chi ba'i chu yis drag sngags bri //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-27: 'jigs byed bkug ste de la mchod //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-28: de nyid yungs kar thum por 'debs //
K12D0465_H0445:556b-29: gang la btags pa bsrung ba'i mchog /
K12D0465_H0445:556b-30: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las /
K12D0465_H0445:556b-31: las phra mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:557a-0: @557a *// de nas de dag la 'khor rnams mngon par dga'
K12D0465_H0445:557a-1: ste; bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas rjes
K12D0465_H0445:557a-2: su yi rang ba phul te mi snang bar gyur
K12D0465_H0445:557a-3: to // mnyam pa chen po la bzhag pa'o //
K12D0465_H0445:557a-4: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12D0465_H0445:557a-5: rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
